name: xbox-one-webdriver-server
description: An Xbox One WebDriver server that pushes URLs to Xbox One devices, built on generic-webdriver-server.
author: Google

scripts.lint: true # linted at the top level
scripts.checkClean: [[ -z "$(git status --short .)" ]] || (echo "Git not clean!"; git status .; exit 1)
scripts.prepack: npm run lint && npm run checkClean
